name: Guns of Wars Multiplayer Online
description:
DeatchMatch First Person Shooter Online!
Play in any place you want. Forget consoles, Tv and relax wherever you want.

Features:
-Two styles of characters.
-DeathMatch Mode.
-5 Available Weapons.
-Easy to use Touch Controls.

*Coming soon*:
*Skin colors for your character
*Zombies?
